biotools.summary: A web-based application for sensitivity analysis of mathematical models. The sensitivity analysis is based on metabolic control analysis, computing the local, global and time-dependent properties of model components. Interactive visualisation facilitates interpretation of usually complex results.

bioschemas.name: SensA
